parameters.query: SELECT id, name FROM brands WHERE name = '{{ $json.body.brand }}' LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO campaigns (
  brand_id, name, objective, daily_budget, locations, 
  languages, age_range, gender, optimization, bidding, status
)
VALUES (
  {{ $json.brandId }},
  '{{ $json.campaign.name || "AI Generated Campaign" }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign.objective }}',
  {{ $json.campaign.daily_budget_mxn }},
  '{{ $json.campaign.locations || "Piedras Negras, MX" }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign.languages || "es,*" }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign.age_range || "18-44" }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign.gender || "ALL" }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign.optimization || "CPC" }}',
  '{{ $json.campaign.bidding || "AUTO" }}',
  'DRAFT'
)
RETURNING id;
